item.title: Determined To Do My Part
item.dc:creator: James MacDonald Ministries
item.description:
Live from the Holy Land, Pastor James leads us through Nehemiah chapter 3.  Have you ever stopped to consider exactly who contributed to the rebuilding project?  The list is important because every servant of God matters to God.  And if you find yourself facing a difficult task, with God’s help you will find a way forward.  Big things can happen when we work together.

Subscribe for devotionals and ministry updates:https://jamesmacdonaldministries.org/

Follow on social media:
IG: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-IG
FB: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-FB
TW: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-TW

Dr. James MacDonald preaches without apology straight from the pages of Scripture, provoking Christians to think and act on their faith.

Big things can happen when we work together. item.title: Determined To Achieve
item.dc:creator: James MacDonald Ministries
item.description:
Each of us has a natural inclination toward being or doing.
If you’re more of a being person, maybe you like sitting, savoring, and seeking - you’re content just being.
You might lean more toward delegation, determination, and duty - you’re all about accomplishing. You’re a doer.
While both of these matter in their appropriate setting, none of the doing is worth doing if it’s not growing out of the being.
In Nehemiah chapter 2,  we will take a candid assessment of where we are and make a plan for where we are going.

Subscribe for devotionals and ministry updates:https://jamesmacdonaldministries.org/

Follow on social media:
IG: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-IG
FB: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-FB
TW: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-TW

Dr. James MacDonald preaches without apology straight from the pages of Scripture, provoking Christians to think and act on their faith.

While both of these matter in their appropriate setting, none of the doing is worth doing if it’s not growing out of the being. item.title: Determined to Care
item.dc:creator: James MacDonald Ministries
item.description:
In a world of quitters, God’s people are determined. And their determination reveals itself in many aspects of a believer’s life - especially in how they care. There are things yet undone that God wants accomplished in the world you live in. Do you care? There is no ministry that is not deeply connected to caring for people.

Nehemiah 1

Subscribe for devotionals and ministry updates:https://jamesmacdonaldministries.org/

item.title: 5 Reasons To Forgive | Vertical Living: [11]
item.dc:creator: James MacDonald Ministries
item.description:
God accepts no love from human hearts that are gripped by hate.
In Vertical Living, we have come to discover from God’s word that mercy halts offense by withholding and grace limits offense by covering. In this sermon, we will see how forgiveness ends offense by releasing.  While there are many rationalizations for our unforgiveness - Scripture offers a roadmap for the vehicle of forgiveness which leads to freedom from self incarceration and a lifetime of bitterness.

Matthew 6:14-15, 18:21-35

Subscribe for devotionals and ministry updates: https://jamesmacdonaldministries.org/

Follow on social media:
IG: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-IG
FB: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-FB
TW: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-TW

Dr. James MacDonald preaches without apology straight from the pages of Scripture, provoking Christians to think and act on their faith.

item.title: Grace When It's Hardest To Love | Vertical Living: [10]
item.dc:creator: James MacDonald Ministries
item.description:
Love2Live2Love - most people want that in concept. But in reality, most of us find ourselves not loving as God would have us. We want to…but we don’t.  In today’s sermon, we will be equipped with scriptural tools to overcome the obstacles of grace.  Grace is continuing to love even when offended.

Matthew 5:38-48

Subscribe for devotionals and ministry updates: https://jamesmacdonaldministries.org/

Follow on social media:

FB: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-FB

Dr. James MacDonald preaches without apology straight from the pages of Scripture, provoking Christians to think and act on their faith.

item.title: Mercy Over Judgment | Vertical Living: [09]
item.dc:creator: James MacDonald Ministries
item.description:
Christ followers are not just responsible for what they do - but also for the impression they give. This week will be a paradigm shift for each of us as we transition from an easy and average perspective of judgment to one of mercy. Mercy is diffi cult and must be learned - because where it is absent, God is blasphemed, Satan will gain a foothold and Christianity becomes a joke.
Matthew 9:9-13

Subscribe for devotionals and ministry updates: https://jamesmacdonaldministries.org/

Follow on social media:

FB: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-FB

item.title: The Necessity of Resolving Offense | Vertical Living: [08]
item.dc:creator: James MacDonald Ministries
item.description:
Offense is an obstacle to love. And the cost of unresolved offense is great. For this cause, God takes it very seriously. No matter your personality, the prescription for resolution is universal. God is the resource and reason for loving others. Matthew 5:21-47

 

Subscribe for devotionals and ministry updates: https://jamesmacdonaldministries.org/

FB: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-FB

item.title: Love: The Greatest Thing | Vertical Living [07]
item.dc:creator: James MacDonald Ministries
item.description:
What is your love story as it pertains to love for God? Jesus said, the sincerity of your love for God is on display in the record of your actions toward the person in your life you find hardest to love. As followers of Christ we do this willingly and gladly. And while love is not the only thing that matters - it is the method to accomplish everything that does.
Matthew 22:34-40

Subscribe for devotionals and ministry updates: https://jamesmacdonaldministries.org/

Follow on social media:
IG: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-IG
FB: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-FB
TW: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-TW

item.title: Competing Loves | Vertical Living [06]
item.dc:creator: James MacDonald Ministries
item.description:
Competing loves are a common problem. And as we are being challenged with the Great Commandment, we are realizing that the problem is not our capacity to love or understanding of the concept - as much as it is that which is competing. “Do you love me more than these?” The question of Jesus to Peter is the one we must all wrestle with today. John 21:1-19

Subscribe for devotionals and ministry updates: https://jamesmacdonaldministries.org/

Follow on social media:
IG: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-IG
FB: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-FB
TW: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-TW

Dr. James MacDonald preaches without apology straight from the pages of Scripture, provoking Christians to think and act on their faith.

item.title: Love Gone Right | Vertical Living [05]
item.dc:creator: James MacDonald Ministries
item.description:
Loving Jesus means keeping his commandments - and most of them are about loving our neighbors. Loving others is loving Jesus because He commands it - and it leads to a deeper experience with Him.

John 14:21 & 1 Corinthians 13

Subscribe for devotionals and ministry updates: https://jamesmacdonaldministries.org/

Follow on social media:
IG: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-IG
FB: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-FB
TW: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-TW

Dr. James MacDonald preaches without apology straight from the pages of Scripture, provoking Christians to think and act on their faith.

item.itunes:title: Love Gone Right | Vertical Living [05]
item.content:encoded:
Loving Jesus means keeping his commandments - and most of them are about loving our neighbors. Loving others is loving Jesus because He commands it - and it leads to a deeper experience with Him.

John 14:21 & 1 Corinthians 13

Subscribe for devotionals and ministry updates: https://jamesmacdonaldministries.org/

Follow on social media:
IG: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-IG
FB: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-FB
TW: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-TW

Dr. James MacDonald preaches without apology straight from the pages of Scripture, provoking Christians to think and act on their faith.

item.itunes:author: James MacDonald Ministries

item.title: Love Gone Wrong | Vertical Living: [04]
item.dc:creator: James MacDonald Ministries
item.description:
You cannot live – really live – until you love God. Love to live! And you cannot really love God unless that shows up in your loving of one another.   God has given each of us the capacity to love.  Vertical love is God before me.  Horizontal love is you before me.  But as with anything,  the enemy has something else in mind.

Satan can’t create anything - he just takes the beautiful things that God has created - twists them and attempts to use them to destroy us. One such twisting is taking a love for God & others and converting it to “legalism.”  Maybe you have been the recipient of a pointed finger or found yourself with the "three pointed back at you."

In Vertical Living, God will take you to the mat with the full weight of all that He is. Watch and learn how to LOVE2LIVE2LOVE.

Subscribe for devotionals and ministry updates: https://jamesmacdonaldministries.org/

Follow on social media:
IG: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-IG
FB: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-FB
TW: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-TW

Dr. James MacDonald preaches without apology straight from the pages of Scripture, provoking Christians to think and act on their faith.

item.itunes:author: James MacDonald Ministries

item.title: Vertical Living | Intro: Part 3
item.dc:creator: James MacDonald Ministries
item.description:
You cannot live – really live – until you love God. Love to live! And you cannot really love God unless that shows up in your loving of one another.

Loving other people adds logs on the fire of personal revival and personal love for God. In fact, the two are so closely interrelated that God is not interested in our expressions of love when we have hatred in our hearts toward another person – especially another one of His children, and most especially those of God’s family who are hardest of all to love. There are things about the Lord you will not comprehend until you are growing in love.

In Vertical Living, God will take you to the mat with the full weight of all that He is. Watch and learn how to LOVE2LIVE2LOVE.

Subscribe for devotionals and ministry updates: https://jamesmacdonaldministries.org/

Follow on social media:
IG: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-IG
FB: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-FB
TW: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-TW

Dr. James MacDonald preaches without apology straight from the pages of Scripture, provoking Christians to think and act on their faith.

item.itunes:author: James MacDonald Ministries

item.title: Drop The Rock
item.dc:creator: James MacDonald Ministries
item.description:
Chances are you are not seeing clearly . . . Especially when it comes to your sin and how you react to the sins of others. And chances are you will soon face a situation where you need to Drop the Rock. Let this message from John 8 show you how to avoid the modern-day stoning: labeling, condemning, and the kind of judgment that Jesus hates. The Word of God and the example of Christ give you the only perspective you really need: His.

Follow us on social media:
IG: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonaldIG
FB: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonaldFB
TW: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonaldTW

Pastor James MacDonald preaches without apology straight from the pages of Scripture, provoking Christians to think and act on their faith. His Bible teaching ministry, Walk in the Word, launched on as a radio broadcast in 1997, with the mission of "igniting passion in the people of God through the proclamation of truth."

item.itunes:author: James MacDonald Ministries

item.title: Forgive Without Limit
item.dc:creator: James MacDonald Ministries
item.description:
There are no enduring relationships without forgiveness.

If you think you have the right to withhold forgiveness it is because you have not properly calculated the debt of sin owed to a Holy God. Even when it's hard... Even when it's hurtful... Forgiven people forgive people. You might be surprised what Jesus said hangs in the balance when it comes to forgiveness.

Forgive without limit...THIS is what we do.

Subscribe for devotionals and ministry updates: jamesmacdonaldministries.org

Follow on social media:
IG: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-IG
FB: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-FB
TW: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-TW

Dr. James MacDonald preaches without apology straight from the pages of Scripture, provoking Christians to think and act on their faith.

item.title: Love Without Condition
item.dc:creator: James MacDonald Ministries
item.description:
God’s house should be a beacon of unconditional love. Get rid of love substitutes and discover how truly unconditional love supercharges relationships.

item.title: The Pivotal Piece • Resurrection
item.dc:creator: James MacDonald Ministries
item.description:
1 Corinthians 15
Without one pivotal piece, the entirety of Christianity comes tumbling down. Thankfully, there are many supporting details and truths surrounding this. Tune in as Pastor James preaches from 1 Corinthians 15 regarding the resurrection of Jesus Christ.

Subscribe for devotionals and ministry updates: https://jamesmacdonaldministries.org/

FB: http://bit.ly/JamesMacDonald-FB
